title: Red devil

|   | A larger cousin of the common imp, with a fiendish grin and two short wings sprouting from its shoulders. It favours barbed tridents, and taunts its victims from afar. |

## Useful Info

**Red devils** are [fire](/Fire "Fire")-themed [tier-4 demons](/Tier-4_demon "Tier-4 demon"), usually found wielding [tridents](/Trident "Trident") or [demon tridents](/Demon_trident "Demon trident"). They inflict [barbs](/Barbs "Barbs") on you, which inflicts damage on movement. Although aggravating, they lack magic, and aren't very strong unless weapon is well-[branded](/Brand "Brand") or if they happen to generate in an early [vault](/Vault "Vault"). They can be found in the [Volcano](/Volcano "Volcano"), [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium"), and the [Hells](/Hell "Hell") (primarily [Gehenna](/Gehenna "Gehenna")). Some monsters may also summon them through the [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon") spell.

## Useful Info

- Check their gear after killing them, as a good [demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") can be a very useful [polearm](/Polearm "Polearm") (though summoned devils will never drop anything).
- Be careful not to kill them over lava, as you will lose their weapon.
- Their tendency to attack at range and vulnerability to cold makes them perfect targets for [Hailstorm](/Hailstorm "Hailstorm").

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), red devils had the kiting [attack flavour](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour") (on attack with reaching, may move back 1 square) instead of barbs.
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), red devils did not have the kiting attack flavour.

Red devil

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
red devil 4 
HP 20-42
HD 7
XP 317
Speed 10
AC 7
EV 13
Will 60
Attack1 19 (hit: barbs)


Resistances rF+++
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Cold
Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Medium
Type red devil, red devil
Flags Fighter

Flying
A larger cousin of the common imp, with a fiendish grin and two short wings sprouting from its shoulders. It favours barbed tridents, and taunts its victims from afar.

Useful Info

Red devils are fire-themed tier-4 demons, usually found wielding tridents or demon tridents. They inflict barbs on you, which inflicts damage on movement. Although aggravating, they lack magic, and aren't very strong unless weapon is well-branded or if they happen to generate in an early vault. They can be found in the Volcano, the Abyss, Pandemonium, and the Hells (primarily Gehenna). Some monsters may also summon them through the Summon Demon spell.

Useful Info

  • Check their gear after killing them, as a good demon trident can be a very useful polearm (though summoned devils will never drop anything).
  • Be careful not to kill them over lava, as you will lose their weapon.
  • Their tendency to attack at range and vulnerability to cold makes them perfect targets for Hailstorm.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, red devils had the kiting attack flavour (on attack with reaching, may move back 1 square) instead of barbs.
  • Prior to 0.13, red devils did not have the kiting attack flavour.

rawPage:
{{version028}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Red devils''' are [[fire]]-themed [[tier-4 demon]]s, usually found wielding [[trident]]s or [[demon trident]]s. They inflict [[barbs]] on you, which inflicts damage on movement. Although aggravating, they lack magic, and aren't very strong unless weapon is well-[[brand]]ed or if they happen to generate in an early [[vault]]. They can be found in the [[Volcano]], [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], and the [[Hell]]s (primarily [[Gehenna]]). Some monsters may also summon them through the [[Summon Demon]] spell.

==Useful Info==
*Check their gear after killing them, as a good [[demon trident]] can be a very useful [[polearm]] (though summoned devils will never drop anything).
*Be careful not to kill them over lava, as you will lose their weapon.
*Their tendency to attack at range and vulnerability to cold makes them perfect targets for [[Hailstorm]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], red devils had the kiting [[attack flavour]] (on attack with reaching, may move back 1 square) instead of barbs.
*Prior to [[0.13]], red devils did not have the kiting attack flavour.
[[Category:Demon]]
